drinks.item_summary: The big ancient pyramid shaped buildings located in Egypt
drinks.item_description:
The Egyptian pyramids are some of the greatest structures in history. They were built during a time when Egypt was one of the richest and most powerful country in the world. The Egyptian pyramids are located in Egypt. Their big size shows the important role that the pharaoh played in ancient Egypt. The leader of the country is called pharaoh in ancient Egypt.\n\n  

Most pyramids were built as tombs for the pharaohs and their wife or husband. Ancient Egyptians believed that their leaders became gods in the after life when they died. To prepare for the next world they built temples to the gods and big pyramid tombs for themselves. These were filled with all the things each king would need for the next world.\n\n 

The early pyramids are built 4600 years ago around the year 2630 BC. The Pyramid of Khufu at Giza, near modern-day city of Cairo, is one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World. It was built for Pharaoh Khufu. The sides of the pyramid were around 755.75 feet (230 meters), and its original height was 481.4 feet (147 meters). It is the largest pyramid in the world.\n\n 

In our day, it is still a big secret how the pyramids were built. Nearly 2.3 million blocks of stone (about 2.5 tons each) had to be cut and carried to build The Great Pyramid. The ancient Greek historian Herodotus wrote that 100,000 men worked 20 years to build the Great Pyramid.\n\n 

Sources
Wikipedia
Link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Egyptian_pyramids

History.com
Link: https://www.history.com/topics/ancient-history/the-egyptian-pyramids

Nationalgeographic
https://www.nationalgeographic.com/history/archaeology/giza-pyramids/

Image: Egypt Vectors by Vecteezy
Link: https://www.vecteezy.com/free-vector/egypt
